DOC.brief_summary: The GEM intervention leverage patient-centered medical home model use GEM tool provide individually tailor , patient-centered care time primary care visit , promote standardize weight management counsel health coach primary team member , coordinate care team weight management service providers/programs ( e.g. , dietitian , health educator , DPP ) , provide feedback provider primary care team patient ' weight management-related goal , progress , care .
DOC.brief_title: The GEM ( Goals Eating Moving ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: To establish efficacy GEM intervention , investigator conduct cluster randomize control 12-month intervention 16 primary care team two urban healthcare system Medical Home model care compare GEM intervention ( intervention arm ) Enhanced Usual Care ( educational material ; control arm ) . The specific aim study : - Test impact GEM intervention weight change , clinical behavioral outcome . - Identify predictor weight loss GEM intervention arm relate : ) goal-setting process b ) intervention component - Determine impact GEM intervention obesity-related counseling practice attitudes primary care provider .
DOC.criteria: Between age 1885 year age , Body mass index ≥30kg/m2 OR Body mass index ≥25 kg/m2 obesity associate comorbidity67,68 Hypertension High Cholesterol Sleep Apnea Osteoarthritis Metabolic Syndrome Under primary care team care least one prior visit provider past 12 month Access telephone , ability travel inperson evaluation baseline , 6 , 12 , 24 month Patients speak English Spanish , Have active psychosis cognitive issue via ICD10 code , Experienced > 5 % loss body weight past year , Participated MOVE ! , DPP , another intensive weight management program ( > 12 session ) past year , Have history bariatric surgery , Are pregnant , become pregnant intervention period , Have provider state participate , Have selfreported inability read 5th grade level .
